channel.title: *****NightScape****Just need web coder/developer! Will make co-owner!
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/163/nightscape.jpg/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/42/nightscape.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=12pt]Hello. My name is Cian. The server that I will be running is called Nightscape. All I need to get this server started is a skilled website developer. Things I need from this person: -Can build a good forum and website.(make it look good ;)) -Can make a webclient for the server. -Has had good experience. -Put advertisements up for this server on moparscape and other sources.. -Needs to be someone I can trust. In return(once all these tasks have been completed) I will make you co-owner for this server :) Contact Information: msn- xxcian38xx@gmail.com Oh and one more thing.. I do not need the application to be formatic, just boast to me all your achievements and past experiences. Think of it as a competition. May the best application win! :D[/size]
Some pics: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/864/advpich.jpg/][IMG]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/5412/advpich.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/691/adv2m.jpg/][IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/7950/adv2m.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/3/java2011051820502928.png/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/2098/java2011051820502928.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/90/adv1.jpg/][IMG]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/5799/adv1.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/864/java2011051820524035.png/][IMG]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/6950/java2011051820524035.png[/img][/URL]
Just a few things of what can be more to come.

item.title: *****NightScape****Just need web coder/developer! Will make co-owner!
item.dc:creator: @Itz_Cian Itz Cian
item.description:
@Itz_Cian wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:15, topic:395772”]I doubt anyone who types like that can do anything more then simple styling. :\

Oh well, good luck finding a good website person. They’re hard to come by. ):[/quote]
Thx :L

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:16, topic:395772”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=492964.msg3604741#msg3604741 date=1305999286]
i have made over 10 serves al succesfull my websights are good because i like to take time in them also i just love to code and i do it when i can
[/quote]
Your ‘websights’ can’t be that good if you don’t use correct grammar.[/quote]

Well, Mikelmao doesn’t type well and he’s awesome at PHP. Though what he says generally makes sense, he just uses “text” words. >.<

Though the thing you quoted just looks terrible tbh. >.>
